title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.35 - Operation of airborne radar equipment restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.35 - Operation of airborne radar equipment restricted

State Regulations

No airborne radar equipment shall be operated or
ground tested on a public passenger ramp and apron area or any area wherein the
directional beam of high intensity radar is within 300 feet or the low
intensity beam (less than 50 KW output) is within 100 feet of another aircraft, an aircraft refueling operation, an aircraft refueling truck or aircraft fuel
or flammable liquid storage facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
